synopsis.text: Utage Live Event Specials for Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba invite you to join the beloved characters in a side-splitting spin-off of the original TV series, set in the unique environment of Junior High and High School Kimetsu Academy! These special episodes were initially showcased at a live event held in Tokyo on October 20th, 2019. The voice actors attended the event and performed live dubbing for their respective characters, providing a unique and entertaining experience for the audience. Later, these specials were professionally dubbed and released as part of the Kimetsu no Yaiba DVD & Blu-ray collection in 2020. Don't miss out on this amusing adventure that brings a fresh perspective to the world of Demon Slayer!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
